TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SuppressMessageAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SuppressMessageAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SuppressMessageAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 隱藏對特定靜態分析工具規則違規的報告，並允許多重隱藏一個單一程式碼成品。

span.span: Suppresses reporting of a specific static analysis tool rule violation, allowing multiple suppressions on a single code artifact.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以套用至任何應用程式項目。This attribute can be applied to any application element. 如需可以抑制違規的完整清單，請參閱[Managed 程式碼警告的程式碼分析](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings)。For a complete list of the violations that can be suppressed, see [Code Analysis for Managed Code Warnings](/visualstudio/code-quality/code-analysis-for-managed-code-warnings). > [!NOTE] > 套用至這個類別中，指定前置處理符號"CODE_ANALYSIS"做為條件可判斷屬性呼叫是包含或省略符號。The is applied to this class, specifying the preprocessing symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" as the conditional symbol that determines whether the attribute call is included or omitted. 如果已定義符號，屬性呼叫的是包含在內。否則，呼叫會省略。If the symbol is defined, the attribute call is included; otherwise, the call is omitted. > > 當您以滑鼠右鍵按一下 Visual Studio 中的程式碼分析警告**錯誤清單**，然後按一下 **隱藏訊息**、 **SuppressMessage**中加入屬性您的程式碼或專案的全域隱藏項目檔案。When you right-click a Code Analysis warning in the Visual Studio **Error List** and then click **Suppress Message(s)**, a **SuppressMessage** attribute is added either in your code or to the project's global suppressions file. 如需有關**SuppressMessage**屬性和其用途，在 Visual Studio 中，請參閱[來源隱藏項目概觀 」 中](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview)。For more information about the **SuppressMessage** attribute and its use in Visual Studio, see [In Source Suppression Overview](/visualstudio/code-quality/in-source-suppression-overview). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來隱藏效能警告訊息。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress performance warning messages. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string category, string checkId) cil managed
Public Sub New (category As String, checkId As String)

param.name: checkId
param.span: 套用屬性的分析工具規則的識別項。

span.span: The identifier of the analysis tool rule the attribute applies to.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定靜態分析工具的分類和分析規則的識別項。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the category of the static analysis tool and the identifier for an analysis rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `category`參數值是特定的分析工具，來分類所識別的規則`checkId`參數。The `category` parameter value is specific to the analysis tool and categorizes the rule identified by the `checkId` parameter. 兩個參數串連成規則的唯一識別碼。The two parameters concatenated together form a unique identifier for the rule. > [!NOTE] > 必須定義前置處理器符號"CODE_ANALYSIS"，這個屬性才有效。The preprocessor symbol "CODE_ANALYSIS" must be defined for this attribute to be effective. 沒有前置處理器符號會導致無法套用屬性。The absence of the preprocessor symbol results in the attribute not being applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來隱藏的警告`Microsoft.Performance`類別目錄和`CA1801`和`CA1804`檢查識別項。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得分類，識別屬性的分類。

span.span: Gets the category identifying the classification of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性描述的工具或工具分析分類適用訊息隱藏項目屬性。The property describes the tool or tool analysis category for which a message suppression attribute applies. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來隱藏的警告`Microsoft.Performance`類別目錄和`CA1801`和`CA1804`檢查識別項。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得隱藏之靜態分析工具規則的識別項。

span.span: Gets the identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

value.span: 隱藏之靜態分析工具規則的識別項。

span.span: The identifier of the static analysis tool rule to be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 串連在一起，和屬性會構成的唯一的核取識別項。Concatenated together, the and properties form a unique check identifier. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性來隱藏的警告`Microsoft.Performance`類別目錄和`CA1801`和`CA1804`檢查識別項。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for the `Microsoft.Performance` category and the `CA1801` and `CA1804` check identifiers. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定隱藏程式碼分析訊息的對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the justification for suppressing the code analysis message.
The justification for suppressing the message.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageId { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MessageId : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在排除準則上展開的選擇性引數。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument expanding on exclusion criteria.

value.span: 包含已展開排除準則的字串。

span.span: A string containing the expanded exclusion criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是選擇性引數，指定額外的排除常值的中繼資料的目標不不夠精確。The property is an optional argument that specifies additional exclusion where the literal metadata target is not sufficiently precise. 例如，無法套用在方法中，且可能會想要隱藏違規針對陳述式的方法中，會提供規則的違規情形，但不是針對在方法中的所有陳述式。For example, the cannot be applied within a method, and it may be desirable to suppress a violation against a statement in the method that will give a rule violation, but not against all statements in the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用来隱藏警告的方法宣告中的特定參數和方法中的特定欄位的屬性。The following code example shows the use of the attribute to suppress warnings for a specific parameter in a method declaration and a specific field in the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/CS/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessageAttribute/VB/program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Scope { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Scope : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與屬性相關的程式碼範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets the scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

value.span: 與屬性相關的程式碼範圍。

span.span: The scope of the code that is relevant for the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是選擇性引數會指定屬性的相關中繼資料範圍。The property is an optional argument that specifies the metadata scope for which the attribute is relevant. 受管理的中繼資料的可能值包括 「 成員 」、 「 資源 」、 「 模組 」、 「 類型 」、 「 方法 」 或 「 命名空間 」。Possible values for managed metadata include "member", "resource", "module", "type", "method", or "namespace".

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定完整路徑，其表示屬性的目標。

span.span: Gets or sets a fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

value.span: 表示屬性目標的完整路徑。

span.span: A fully qualified path that represents the target of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用來識別屬性的分析目標的選擇性引數。The property is an optional argument identifying the analysis target of the attribute. 範例值是":System.Void System.IO.Stream.ctor （)"。An example value is "System.IO.Stream.ctor():System.Void". 因為它是完整格式，可能很長，特別是針對目標，例如參數。Because it is fully qualified, it can be long, particularly for targets such as parameters. 自動格式化參數應該能夠使用分析工具使用者介面。The analysis tool user interface should be capable of automatically formatting the parameter.
